name: Pyroworks (itch)
description:
A game about fireworks. Servers maybe not work due to so many people joining, so it can load infinitely (and yes it includes singleplayer too because I made some mistakes while making it...). All donations will be put towards better servers. You can join the server here but PLEASE READ THE #FAQ CHANNEL! (and play the tutorial ingame) https://discord.gg/fX9mbhCQA3. New update will be when I get a new PC, somewhere in mid 2022. And it's only for windows. And you need a pretty powerful PC to run it so... don't expect to play it on a 2009 ThinkPad. Most of issues with servers etc will be fixed in the next update so stay tuned. Next year in 2022 gonna be crazy.
